function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Spread of contagious diseases in the workplace due to physical presence of employees.","Impact":"Risk of employees falling ill and spreading the disease within the workplace.","Mitigation":"Implement remote work policies, social distancing measures, and regular sanitization protocols.","Technologies":"Remote collaboration tools, contactless entry systems, and air purifiers.","People":"Employees, visitors, and on-site service providers.","Owner":"Employers, facility managers, and health and safety teams."},{"Description":"Relocation of operation expenses to workplace modification activities.","Impact":"Potential for increased risk of exposure and transmission of contagious diseases during workplace modifications.","Mitigation":"Conduct modifications during off-peak hours, enforce strict health and safety protocols during modifications, and limit the number of workers present during modifications.","Technologies":"Virtual planning and design tools, remote monitoring systems, and automated construction equipment.","People":"Construction workers, maintenance staff, and project managers.","Owner":"Facility managers, construction supervisors, and health and safety teams."},{"Description":"Transition from physical workspace to virtual and agile workspace.","Impact":"Risk of overlooking ergonomic and health considerations in virtual and agile workspaces, leading to potential health issues for employees.","Mitigation":"Provide ergonomic assessments and guidelines for remote work setups, offer virtual health and wellness programs, and maintain regular communication to address employee concerns.","Technologies":"Remote ergonomic assessment tools, virtual health platforms, and communication and collaboration software.","People":"Remote employees, HR personnel, and health and safety teams.","Owner":"Employers, HR departments, and health and safety teams."}]}
